## Mutator.shouldIgnoreMutatorEvent\_() method

Returns whether the given event in the mutator workspace should be ignored when deciding whether to update the workspace and compose the block or not.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
shouldIgnoreMutatorEvent_(e: Abstract): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  e | Abstract | The event. |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean

Whether to ignore the event or not.
